Attacks.Name: Petal Dance
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character may advance S. If a wild is rolled, each enemy character within range 2 of the target suffers 1 damage.

Attacks.Name: Giga Drain
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character removes damage equal to half the damage dealt (rounded up).

Attacks.Name: Solar Beam
Attacks.Effect: This attack requires one turn to charge before it can be used. After charging, on the next activation of this character, use this attack without paying its power cost. If a wild is rolled, the target character is Staggered.

Superpowers.Name: Serene Aura
Superpowers.Effect: Allied characters within range add 1 die to their Defense rolls against energy attacks.

Superpowers.Name: Healing Fragrance
Superpowers.Effect: Choose up to two allied characters within range. Each chosen character removes 2 damage and one special condition.

Attacks.Name: Earthquake
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all other characters within range 2 of this character.

Superpowers.Name: Chlorophyll Surge
Superpowers.Effect: This character immediately gains 2 power and may make an immediate move action. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Verdant Shield
Superpowers.Effect: While this character has 3 or more power, reduce the damage from enemy attacks by 1, to a minimum of 1.
